resources.string: Register for a free speedflyers account to get full spot details and comments, contribute your own spot, store your favourites and more
Welcome to Speedflyers\n\n Community Site Guide, School/Organisation Directory and anything else we want it to be.

Launch Conditions\n\nIdeal conditions for sites, from wind directions to hazards to be avoided.
